description:
Rep. Nancy Mace is doubling down and will now file a bill that would ban men from women's spaces in all federal properties all across the country.

I don’t care. I’m doubling down, and won’t be quiet because some man tells me to. pic.twitter.com/aKwmBF510Q
— Rep. Nancy Mace (@RepNancyMace) November 20, 2024

It should be for all spaces and not just the ones owned by the government but I guess this is the best we can do. And you would think that it’s already illegal for men to enter the women’s room but that’s neither here nor the
title: Nancy Mace ain't scared; now plans to ban men in women’s spaces on ALL federal property

description:
Who would have guessed that it would take less than 100 years for German officials to warn Jewish people to “be careful” and watch out for whom they reveal their identity?

Berlin just issued a message to gays and Jews warning them that they are not safe in arab communities.

It took 90 years, but Jews and gays need to try and hide their identities in Berlin again. 👌 pic.twitter.com/qcohMwu234
— Saul Sadka (@Saul_Sadka) November 18, 2024

According to the
title: German officials warn Jews to "be careful" in Arab neighborhoods if they know what's good for them

description:
One of the many problems with the ladies on The View is that they don’t do this little thing called “think” and often get themselves in trouble after making up random things from thin air. This has happened to all of them and yesterday Sunny Hostin was forced to awkwardly read a legal disclaimer after daring to tie Matt Gaetz with “child trafficking or trafficking across state lines and having sex with a 17-year-old.”

NEW: The View host Sunny Hostin fumes as she is forced to read a legal note just minutes after presenting the Matt Gaetz allegations as a “fact.”

Hostin: They discussed the fact that once [Gaetz] finds out that she's 17, he stops having s*x with her.

Hostin 3 min later: Matt…
title: Watch: This look on Sunny Hostin face reading a legal note after SLANDERING Matt Gaetz is priceless

description:
In 2016, the Watertown School District defied the biological reality that has been evident since humans roamed this earth and allowed males to enter female-only spaces, including bathrooms. However, given that this is not only foolish and defies all logic, it’s also dangerous and sets a bad precedent. Subsequently, the district put its thinking caps back on and revered the policy.

BREAKING: Watertown School District bans males from girIs' bathrooms and sports in a reversal from 2016 policy. pic.twitter.com/jHJCn6T5mJ
— End Wokeness (@EndWokeness) November 20, 2024
title: School District reverses woke 2016 policy, goes back to banning boys from the girls' bathroom

description:

title: Watch: It’s Deportation Time! Liberals Conspire To Sabotage Trump's Plan

description:
Farmers are protesting in the UK because the government believes they are entitled to the hard work of generational farmers for reasons that will never make sense.

London — At the farmers protest against the incoming inheritance tax on farms, children ride mock tractors. In 2026, inherited agricultural assets worth more than £1m will be taxed at 20 percent. pic.twitter.com/dNQKXIWmRb
— Andy Ngo 🏳️🌈 (@MrAndyNgo) November 19, 2024


According to the
title: Watch: UK Farmers protest against New inheritance tax

description:
We're kicking off the holiday season with a controversy over who should be allowed in the women's bathroom. Republicans think only women. Democrats think women and men who say they're women. And at the center of the controversy is South Carolina Congresswoman Nancy Mace, who, apropos of nothing, is FIIIIIIINE.

To everyone threatening my life: Your intimidation won't stop me from standing up for women.

Maybe channel those big feelings and loud opinions into finding the right restroom. https://t.co/E3Jx8IgEea
— Rep. Nancy Mace (@RepNancyMace) November 19, 2024
title: Nancy Mace embarrasses smug reporter, doubles down on opposition over peens in the women's bathroom

description:
Yesterday, luxury vehicle manufacturer Jaguar unveiled their freaky new marketing campaign, President Donald Trump has announced he will use the military to carry out mass deportations, his election victory has led to a leftist exodus from Elon Musk’s X as many are migrating to Twitter alternative Bluesky, and so much more!

Facebook doesn't want you reading this post or any others lately. Their algorithm hides our stories and shenanigans as best it can. The best way to stick it to Zuckerface? Bookmark LouderWithCrowder.com and check us out throughout the day!

title: It’s Deportation Time: What Can Trump Really Do? (Sources)
